message: The issue I have is when a user already has a FB or Linkedin session open in their browser and my web app automagically logs user in. How can I make it where they are required to type in their user credentials for FB or Linkedin each time?
You can't because that's a control on Facebook or LinkedIn sites, it's their cookies, their user session that you can't modify because it doesn't belong to your domain.
Yea, I assumed what you said but wanted to ask the question before I passed on the idea. Thanks omab!
